title: Death Proof
plot_simple: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

title: Billy Elliot
filming_locations: Canary Wharf Underground Station, Canary Wharf, Isle of Dogs, London, England, UK
plot_simple: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

title: The Elephant Man
plot_simple: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.

title: Gremlins
filming_locations: Colonial Street, Backlot, Universal Studios - 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, California, USA
plot_simple: A boy inadvertantly breaks 3 important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

title: Dawn of the Dead
plot_simple: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman, and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

title: A Serious Man
filming_locations: Uptown Vision Clinic, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA
plot_simple: A black comedy drama centered on Larry Gopnik, a Midwestern professor who watches his life unravel through multiple sudden incidents. Though seeking for meaning and answers he seems to stay stalled.

title: Melancholia
plot_simple: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with the Earth.

title: Up
plot_simple: By tying thousands of balloons to his home, 78-year-old Carl sets out to fulfill his lifelong dream to see the wilds of South America. Russell, a wilderness explorer 70 years younger, inadvertently becomes a stowaway.

title: Gone with the Wind
also_known_as: Lo que el viento se llevó
plot_simple: American classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man carry on a turbulent love affair in the American south during the Civil War and Reconstruction.

title: Unbreakable
filming_locations: Franklin Field - 235 S. 33rd Street, University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA
plot_simple: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

title: The Crow
plot_simple: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

title: L.A. Confidential
filming_locations: 1277 S. Cochran Ave, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - the straight-laced, the brutal, and the sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
plot_simple: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

title: Tombstone
plot_simple: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: Looper
plot_simple: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a hired gun awaits. Someone like Joe, who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by transporting back Joe's future self.

title: Mallrats
filming_locations: Eden Prairie Center Mall - 8251 Flying Cloud Drive, Eden Prairie, Minnesota, USA
plot_simple: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

title: Hot Fuzz
filming_locations: Barn Theatre, Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, England, UK
plot_simple: Jealous colleagues conspire to get a top London cop transferred to a small town and paired with a witless new partner. On the beat, the pair stumble upon a series of suspicious accidents and events.

title: United 93
plot_simple: A real time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

title: Tonari no Totoro
plot_simple: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wonderous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: American History X
filming_locations: Johnie's Coffee Shop - 6101 Wilshire Boulevard, Fairfax, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Little Miss Sunshine
plot_simple: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
plot_simple: A sleazy defense attorney has a crisis of conscience when he represents a wealthy client who has a foolproof plan to beat the system.

title: Monster
plot_simple: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
plot_simple: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.

title: Field of Dreams
plot_simple: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the Chicago Black Sox come.

title: Predator
plot_simple: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

title: Goldfinger
plot_simple: Investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
filming_locations: El Camino College, Torrance, California, USA
plot_simple: Eight years on, a new terrorist leader, Bane, overwhelms Gotham's finest, and the Dark Knight resurfaces to protect a city that has branded him an enemy.

title: Rio
plot_simple: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with this bird of his dreams.

title: Stand by Me
filming_locations: 380 South San Rafael Avenue, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

title: Shrek
plot_simple: An ogre, in order to regain his swamp, travels along with an annoying donkey in order to bring a princess to a scheming lord, wishing himself King.

title: Chronicle
filming_locations: Artscape Theater, D F Malan Street, Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
plot_simple: Whilst attending a party, three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon, though, they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

title: War Horse
filming_locations: Holwell Farm, Bonehill Rocks, Widecombe-in-the-Moor, Devon
plot_simple: Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.

title: The Goonies
plot_simple: A group of kids embark on a wild adventure after finding a pirate treasure map.

title: RocknRolla
filming_locations: Abandoned Railway Line, near London City Airport, Newham, East London, London, England, UK
plot_simple: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. While the city's seasoned criminals vie for the cash, an unexpected player -- a drugged out rock 'n' roller presumed to be dead but very much alive...

title: Definitely, Maybe
filming_locations: New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

title: Misery
plot_simple: A famous novelist is "rescued" from a car crash by an obsessed fan.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
plot_simple: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs; the queen feeds her a poison apple, but Prince Charming awakens her with a kiss.

title: Kingdom of Heaven
plot_simple: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot_simple: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of US soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: Good Night, and Good Luck.
filming_locations: CBS Television City - 7800 Beverly Blvd., Fairfax, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: Broadcast journalist  looks to bring down Senator .

title: Moon
filming_locations: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

title: The Fly
filming_locations: John Anderson Charcoal Broiled Hamburgers, 5270 Yonge Street, Willowdale, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
plot_simple: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

title: The Last Samurai
plot_simple: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

title: The Wizard of Oz
plot_simple: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Iron Man
filming_locations: Palmdale Regional Airport, Palmdale, California, USA
plot_simple: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.

title: Little Children
plot_simple: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations.

title: Braveheart
plot_simple: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier whom tried to rape her, a commoner begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron-fist.

title: Aliens
filming_locations: Acton Lane Power Station, Acton Lane, Acton, London, England, UK
plot_simple:
The planet from 
 has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

title: Groundhog Day
plot_simple: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.

title: Casino
filming_locations: 357 Desert Inn Road, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA
plot_simple: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
filming_locations: Albury Park, Guildford, Surrey, England, UK
plot_simple: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

title: Amores perros
filming_locations: Colonia Condesa, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
plot_simple: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

title: Meet Joe Black
filming_locations: Aldrich Mansion - 836 Warwick Neck Avenue, Warwick, Rhode Island, USA
plot_simple: A media mogul acts as a guide to Death, who takes the form of a young man to learn about life on Earth and in the process, fall in love with his guide's daughter.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
also_known_as: El puente sobre el río Kwai
plot_simple: After settling his differences with a Japanese PoW camp commander, a British colonel co-operates to oversee his men's construction of a railway bridge for their captors - while oblivious to a plan by the Allies to destroy it.

title: Mystic River
filming_locations: Bear dens, Long Crouch Woods, Franklin Park, Boston, Massachusetts, USA
plot_simple: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

title: Brick
plot_simple: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

title: The Karate Kid
filming_locations: 5410 Wilshire Blvd., Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.

title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
plot_simple: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super-intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

title: The Cabin in the Woods
plot_simple: Five friends go for a break at a remote cabin in the woods, where they get more than they bargained for. Together, they must discover the truth behind the cabin in the woods.

title: Chinatown
filming_locations: 1315 South El Molino Drive, South Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: A private detective investigating an adultery case stumbles on to a scheme of murder that has something to do with water.

title: The Rock
filming_locations: Alcatraz Island, San Francisco Bay, California, USA
plot_simple: A renegade general and his group of U.S. Marines take over Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco Bay with biological weapons. A chemical weapons specialist and the only man to have ever escaped from the Rock attempt to prevent chaos.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
plot_simple: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

title: Mr. Brooks
also_known_as: A Face Oculta de Mr. Brooks
plot_simple: A psychological thriller about a man who is sometimes controlled by his murder-and-mayhem-loving alter ego.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
also_known_as: Andrew Lloyd Webber's The Phantom of the Opera
plot_simple: A disfigured musical genius, hidden away in the Paris Opera House, terrorizes the opera company for the unwitting benefit of a young protégée whom he trains and loves.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot_simple: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: Ronin
plot_simple: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
plot_simple: When Jason Bourne is framed for a botched CIA operation he is forced to take up his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Dogville
filming_locations: Film i Väst, Nohab Industrial Estate, Trollhättan, Västra Götalands län, Sweden
plot_simple: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado town. In exchange, she agrees to work for them. As a search visits town, she finds out that their support has a price. Yet her dangerous secret is never far away...

title: A Scanner Darkly
also_known_as: A Scanner Darkly - Der dunkle Schirm
plot_simple: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

title: Enchanted
filming_locations: 875 Third Avenue, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
also_known_as: Alexandre Dumas' The Count of Monte Cristo
filming_locations: Ardmore Studios, Herbert Road, Bray, County Wicklow, Ireland
plot_simple: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge

title: Ice Age
plot_simple: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.

title: Total Recall
filming_locations: Estudios Churubusco Azteca, Mexico City, Distrito Federal, Mexico
plot_simple: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real, or does he?

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
also_known_as: Eterno resplandor de una mente sin recuerdos
filming_locations: 123 Valentine Lane, Yonkers, New York, USA
plot_simple: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

title: Office Space
plot_simple: Comedic tale of company workers who hate their jobs and decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

title: Toy Story 3
plot_simple: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

title: Back to the Future Part III
filming_locations: 161 N. Magnolia Avenue, Monrovia, California, USA
plot_simple: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

title: 127 Hours
plot_simple: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
filming_locations: Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to Brooklyn over 30 years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Manhattan
filming_locations: 5th Avenue, Manhattan, New York City, New York, USA
plot_simple: A divorced New Yorker currently dating a high-schooler brings himself to look for love in the mistress of his best friend instead.

title: Bolt
also_known_as: Bolt - Un perro fuera de serie
plot_simple: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

title: The Negotiator
filming_locations: 77 W. Wacker Drive, Downtown, Chicago, Illinois, USA
plot_simple: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Hugo
plot_simple: Set in 1930s Paris, an orphan who lives in the walls of a train station is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

title: The School of Rock
filming_locations: Buckley Country Day School - I.U. Willets Road, Herricks, Long Island, New York, USA
plot_simple: A wannabe rock star in need of cash poses as a substitute teacher at a prep school, and tries to turn his class into a rock band.

title: There Will Be Blood
plot_simple: A story about family, greed, religion, and oil, centered around a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

title: Metropolis
plot_simple: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.
runtime: USA: 123 min (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)
119 min (DVD edition) (2002 Murnau Foundation 75th aniversary restored version)

title: The Descent
plot_simple: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.

title: Ghost World
plot_simple: Enid and Rebecca are social outsiders who, after graduating from high school, play a mean prank on a middle-aged geek.

title: The Hunt for Red October
plot_simple: In 1984, the USSR's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?

title: Serenity
filming_locations: Anza-Borrego Desert State Park - 200 Palm Canyon Drive, Borrego Springs, California, USA
plot_simple: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.

title: 21 Jump Street
plot_simple: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

title: Buried
plot_simple: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.

title: The Prestige
filming_locations: Spring Street Towers - 650 S. Spring Street, Downtown, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: The rivalry between two magicians is exacerbated when one of them performs the ultimate illusion.

title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
plot_simple: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.

title: District 9
plot_simple: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

title: Inglourious Basterds
plot_simple: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: We Were Soldiers
filming_locations: Castle Green Apartments - 99 S. Raymond, Pasadena, California, USA
plot_simple: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

title: Home Alone
plot_simple: An 8-year-old boy, who is accidentally left behind while his family flies to France for Christmas, has to defend his home against idiotic burglars.

title: Inception
filming_locations: 1240 S Hope St, Los Angeles, California, USA
plot_simple: In a world where technology exists to enter the human mind through dream invasion, a highly skilled thief is given a final chance at redemption which involves executing his toughest job to date: Inception.
